alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Garfield; Petroleum; Southwest Phillips (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 27 at 6:59PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Phillips, northeastern Petroleum and northwestern Garfield Counties through 800 PM MDT... At 658 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles west of Hays to 13 miles northeast of Roy. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Malta, Zortman, Fourchette, U L Bend Rec Area, Crooked Creek Rec Area, Phillips, Landusky, and Sun Prairie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southeast Phillips; Garfield; Petroleum; Southwest Phillips
